Congress passes student loans, highway jobs bill

Congress passed a massive measure that will salvage some 2.8 million jobs and shield college students from sharply higher college loan interest rates. (AP, 4:59 p.m.)

Two great white sharks were spotted off the coast of Chatham, the first documented sightings of the 2012 summer season. (Globe, 1:11 p.m.)

Toyota to recall about 154,000 Lexus SUVs to fix floor mat

Federal safety regulators said that they asked the company to recall about 154,000 Lexus SUVs because their floor mats can trap the gas pedal causing the vehicles to speed up.
